title: ninu neranammiti (v)
sahitya:
ninu neranammiti gaNanAyaka natajana vighna vinAshana nirata


  
P:  ninu neranammiti gaNanAyaka natajana vighna vinAshana nirata
A:  munigaNa praNuta mangaLa carita muraLI krSNa sahOdarI suta
				(muktIyi svara)
canduruDu caviti dinamuna parihasincaga madamaNaca shapincitivi 
sharaNu kAvu managa nI vadani kSaminci dayanu shApamupa shamincitivi
				(ettugaDa)
sumukha pAvana shrta sumukha
caraNam 1    nE nI pAdamE nammitini
 caraNam 2    narAdi vinuta pada vAraNa mukha bhaya vAraNa guNa dAna vitaraNa
 caraNam 3    nI divya caritamE cadiviti krtArthuDaitini paravashincitini 
dayAmaya mayAkrta khalamula manninci sukrta niratuni ghananumalupu
 caraNam 4    vrkSa rUpa valarUpa nara rUpulaiyunna nimAcarula muvvaranu 
pakSi rUpivai vArala vadhinci I kSitiki shAnti subhIkSa mosagina
 caraNam 5    vAraNA shinAgra mincina durAsharuni durAma nirAsha gAvimpa 
vAmana rUpivai mincina parAkramamuna vijrumbhinci pAdamu rA
kAshi talapai niDi aNaci vadhinci rendava pAdamu kAshI talamandA 
paraci kApADi paramAnanda nelagolpina ninu pogaDa mEmenta
 caraNam 6    sarva jagamulaku gati jananI janakulEyani pArvatini 
sAmbashivuni gani vandanamu salipi mummAru tirigi vacci nilicina 
guNAkara vinAyakuni gani smita vadanamu merayu manasu mudamuna nalaraga
bhavuDu sarva gaNAdhipuDai valaru manidIvena losagi ninniyaminci
